mainPackage

Class PostnetDecode

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainPackage.PostnetDecode

  • public class PostnetDecode
extends java.lang.Object
    Automatically decodes the given barcode to correct postnet format
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zach Swanson

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String barcode
      barcode passed to the constructor
      private int checkSum
      barcode checksum
      private int[] valueKey
      holds the value of a 1 at each index and is used to calculate the encoded zip number based on this modified binary encoding
      private java.lang.String zip
      decoded postnet zip

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PostnetDecode(java.lang.String barcode)
      Constructs a new PostnetDecode with this barcode and calls decode, verfiyChecksum, and formatZip

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Encodes this zip to barcode format
      void displayZip()
      Prints decoded zip to console
      private void formatZip()
      Adds proper dashes to zip depending on version
      java.lang.String getBarcode()
      Returns the original barcode
      java.lang.String getZip()
      Returns the formatted zip
      private void verifyChecksum()
      Verifies checksum of barcode to ensure there were no errors in reading

                     throws java.lang.Exception

        java.lang.Exception - checksum was incorrect; barcode corrupt
